string.value: I should meet Yoona at Southperry for a little quiz!
There's a quest before the quiz starts. I better take care of that fast.
I was able to safely obtain Beginner's Guide to Shopping at the Cash Shop.
Hi, you must be a first-timer here~! Would you like to participate in a Shopping Quiz?

First, before you start solving the questions, it'll be best for you to experience the Cash Shop firsthand. As long as you keep your composure and answer these questions with a steady hand, you'll be fine. The Beginner's Shopping Guide can be purchased at the Cash Shop for 1 meso, so go get your copy now! The Cash Shop can be found at the bottom right corner of the screen.
That's fine. If you ever change your mind, let me know.
Wow, that was fast. I think you have mastered the ins and outs of shopping. I think you're more than qualified to take on the Shopping Quiz!
Are you ready to answer the questions?
Oh no, you haven't found The Beginner's Guide to Shopping? It's on sale right now, so find it!
